writer.name: 罗伯特·路易斯·史蒂文森 Robert Louis Stevenson

introduction: 博士发明了一种药水，喝了之后能将自己邪恶的一部分分离出来，到了夜晚……The timeless tale of two selves lives on in A Storybook Classic’s adorable adaptation of Robert Louis Stevenson’s thrilling novella, Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde. In this fantastic story of potions and pandemonium, Dr. Jekyll, famed English scientist, embarks on an experiment to extract the evil from within himself, accidentally splitting his personality into two and creating Mr. Hyde—a powerful monster whose blood-lust terrorizes the city of London every night and baffles the police in the morning. When Dr. Jekyll wakes up from Mr. Hyde ’s evil rendezvous, he realizes he must figure out how to stop the beast and reunite the two sides that are battling for his body and soul.
